website_summaries.verdict: A versatile stained glass grinder with a number of appealing features for the professional artisan.
pros: The clever design allows the large work surface to be inclined to help alleviate muscle fatigue
The unit comes with two bits, a second story work platform, and a small shield for added protection
cons: The problems with the former cooling method have been address with a new electric pump, but the system still could use a minor tweak or two

customer_reviews.title: The grinder bits were dirty and scored and also looked like they were used
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as new. stained glass dust from grinder all over the inside indicating it had been used and re-packaged as new. The grinder bits were dirty and scored and also looked like they were used. the grinder motor did not work. I should have taken some photo's but I already boxed it and sent it back after writing this review.
customer_reviews.author: kathyh

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade
customer_reviews.text: This was an upgrade for me from a grinder made in the 80's. It has a powerful motor, which results in a smooth grind with very little throw back or splashing. The water cup satyes filled for about an hour. For me the drain tube works well because I use the grinder in a laundry sink. But if you intend to use this on a table top you will want it sitting in a pan or something similar for it to drain into.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Best glass/tile grinder
customer_reviews.text: This is the best grinder I’ve used. My first one endured 6 years of heavy use and still works but the pump might be starting to go. I didn’t realize how fantastic it was till I tried a different model. Just bought #2 here as this was the lowest price I found.
customer_reviews.author: alicia

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fabulous tool for stained glass artists!
customer_reviews.text: I love this grinder! It is quiet and easy to use. I really like the reservoir pump. You really need to use a sponge or the water sprays all over the place but that is hardly a draw back. I also like that there is a cap over the post. This keeps any water from getting into the motor casing. The platform is close to the wheel so small pieces are still supported on the platform - no other tool is needed to hold them for grinding. I haven’t tried the tilt yet but so far I would highly recommend this grinder. Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: james thierer

customer_reviews.title: Getting this product used was a bad decision.
customer_reviews.text: I did not unpackage the product for a few weeks, but when I did, I was surprised at the poor condition. The grinder was dirty. The inside parts were still covered with sludge. The tube leading to the water pump was dirty and bent. The small bronze cap that seals the grinder bit was missing. The rating of "very good" from the company led me to believe that the product had been opened and returned with little use. Not so! I had passed the deadline to return this item, so now I am sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this Grinder! Don't know how I got along without it.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I bought this grinder a few weeks ago and it arrived without the face shield . The water drains out way too fast , might modify this by plugging the hole with wax and making a pin hole .Apart from that and having only used it twice it seems ok for the money .
customer_reviews.author: Shopper T

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: The grinder wouks great, we have already started using it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Tedeschi

customer_reviews.title: Very useful!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. It is a must for my glass art.
customer_reviews.author: Jees

customer_reviews.title: Great product, essential for my business!
customer_reviews.text: I love this grinder. I just had to buy my second one after 10 years of heavy use. Being able to set it up on the slant is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jesica Carleton

customer_reviews.title: Great grinder
customer_reviews.text: This is my second grinder. And I love it. I had the first one until the motor wore out. So I bought another one.
customer_reviews.author: terri crandall

customer_reviews.title: Work surface has edges that catch glass when grinding
customer_reviews.text: Water drains too fast, and when you grinding glass it's work surface drags on glass and edges of the work surface are slightly higher and longer pieces of glass catch on it. Poor design
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great grinder for stained glass work.
customer_reviews.text: The cooling tower/sponge does not seem to be very effective. Have to water to sponge periodically. Otherwise, the grinder is a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Duna Penn

customer_reviews.title: good quality grinder
customer_reviews.text: Received product much sooner than expected; quality was great and nothing broken. Was exactly what I expected with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: pib

customer_reviews.title: Powerful & easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described with plenty of power, easy clean up
customer_reviews.author: dragon lady

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: love it, its easy to use and work like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: S. Boyet

customer_reviews.title: Grinding away
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this little machine. It is a great price and does a great job. I ordered it and it was here fast.
customer_reviews.author: Not Far

customer_reviews.title: Very fast shipping, well packed and great grinder!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I wanted, it works like a charm, and I got it within days of ordering it.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Glass grinder to wife =foot massage for me
customer_reviews.text: Since it was a gift to my wife,all I can say,is that I now get nightly foot massages.She stated and I quote:"I love it"
customer_reviews.author: Roger Jaimeyfield

customer_reviews.title: Great grinder
customer_reviews.text: I am just getting back into stained glass and I love how this operates! I am planning on teaching my 8 year old nephew this summer about stain glass and I know that this will help me out a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Knight

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable I love it, Know problems with keeping sponge wet grinding is clean and fast. Thanks I love it. Bobbbie
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Hickman

customer_reviews.title: A good review
customer_reviews.text: This is an upgrade for myself and I will say it is a very good tool! I am very happy with it and would give a recommendation to try it!
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Great Grinder
customer_reviews.text: Great grinder. The clear protector is nice. I attached a small LED light to help viewing the grinding. This could be an option in the future. The LED light is a simple book reading light with flexible goose neck. Simply attach some Velcro strips to the light base. Works perfect. I purchased a little foot switch so I don’t have to look for the on/off switch every time I use the grinder.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Sorely Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I purchased this a year or so ago and had it sitting in the box because I had another grinder I was using. Upon opening, I found that there were pieces missing (no eye protection shield) and no instructions whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: KarmaGuard

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This grinder works great. When you set it on the flat mode it’s great. The only negative comment I have about it is that when you use the slanted mode water tends to run down your arm. Other than that it works great it’s easy to change the bits.
customer_reviews.author: chad hardy

customer_reviews.title: inferior water feed.
customer_reviews.text: The water feed apparatus is inferior on this grinder. It keeps the sponge behind the grinder bit wet but doesn't keep the bit wet enough and then the bit chews the glass and chips the edges. There is a drain hole in the water catch basin so it is difficult to put enough water in the basin so you can eliminate the the feed apparatus. If there was a plug to fit into the drain hole, I didn't receive it. The grinding bit that was sent with the grinder is too large and doesn't grind a smaller curve that might be needed within the design of the glass.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Reese

customer_reviews.title: Like the tilted surface
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to finish out my glass studio. Works well. Like the tilted surface, makes it easier to see.
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best grinder, love the angle so much easier to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Cordisio

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: This little sucker travels back and forth with me wherever I go. Easy to set up, easy to maintain. The only tricky part is getting the outflow hose reattached to the unit every time I set it up, as it's a SUPER tight fit (which you want!) I could work around that by not putting it back in the original box every time, but I want this baby to last me years.
customer_reviews.author: LBooth

customer_reviews.title: Glass dust
customer_reviews.text: I’m self-taught with stained glass, so I don’t know if I am doing it wrong, but there is a lot of glass dust. I manage, don’t worry, just didn’t know if that was how a grinder worked. I like the Water tower as I don’t have to worry about keeping The bit wet. The Motrin hums quietly when using. Overall good quality purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Miller

customer_reviews.title: bad design on water container.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at first. Bit now sponge on water container will not hold water back have to block water flow or replace water every 2 minutes tried different sponges but same issue annoying bad design now I have to manually wet sponge while cutting glass not happy at all. It's only a few months old and only created a few small stain glass designed. Probably to late to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this grinder. I like tilting it so I can easily see where the grinder touches the glass.
customer_reviews.author: Temple Naff

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: This product is as stated, love the angle setup, water floods and keeps the grinding bit clean
customer_reviews.author: Big RonB59

customer_reviews.title: Gryphon Studio Stained Glass Grinder
customer_reviews.text: This Grinder performs very well. It was easy to assemble and is a good value. Have used a couple of times and it performs as it is supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: Great machine. I use it hard and holds up very good. Good price for good machine. Very strong motor.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Foster

product_meta.title: Gryphon Convertible Professional Stained Glass Grinder
product_meta.description: Size:ConvertibleThe Gryphon Covertible Grinder offers a revolutionary advance in comfort. By simply rotating the base, the grinding surface converts from horizontal to inclined. For the first time, you can sit while grinding. Even if you stand, the inclined work surface reduces fatigue because you no longer need to stoop over your work to see what you are doing. The Gryphon Convertible Grinder is supplied with two grinding bits, a 1" and a 1/4". Of course the grinder can except all other sizes of bits as well, including our Slip-On Bits A new electric automatic pump supplies a reliable and constant flow of water directly to the bit regardless of saw orientation. The use of a sponge is optional with the electric pump.
feature_bullets: LARGE WORK SURFACE - 13.5" by 10.5" with a second story platform.

REVOLUTIONARY ADVANCE IN COMFORT - By simply rotating the base, the grinding surface converts from horizontal to inclined. For the first time, you can sit while grinding. Even if you stand, the inclined work surface reduces fatigue because you no longer need to stoop over your work to see what you are doing.

BUILT-IN ELECTRIC PUMP WITH SPONGELESS COOLING - A new electric automatic pump supplies a reliable and constant flow of water directly to the bit regardless of saw orientation. Improved cooling increases the lifespan of bits. The use of a sponge is optional with the electric pump.
INCLUDED - The Gryphon Convertible Grinder is supplied with two grinding bits, a 1" and a 1/4". Of course the grinder can except all other sizes of bits as well, including our Slip-On Bits.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars88 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
